Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our training process

How long does the assessment take?

The comprehensive assessment takes approximately 1-3 minutes to complete. Our system provides instant results upon submission.

Is the career report really free?

Yes, your personalized drone career report is completely free. We believe everyone should have access to quality career guidance.

What industries are covered?

We cover all major drone industry sectors including construction, agriculture, film/TV, asset inspection, real estate, mining, and emergency services.
